text: Follow Us on Twitter The nominations for the 69th Annual Emmy Awards were unveiled on Thursday morning. The honorees were announced at the Television Academy ’ s Wolf Theatre at the Saban Media Center in North Hollywood by “ Veep ” actress Anna Chlumsky, “ S. W. A. T. ” star Shemar Moore, and Television Academy CEO Hayma Washington at 8 : 30 a. m. PT. HBO ’ s “ Westworld ” and NBC ’ s “ Saturday Night Live ” tied for the most nominations for the 2017 Emmy Awards, earning the most with 22 each. As Peak TV reaches new heights, it ’ s only fitting that this year saw a bigger Emmy ballot. Drama series had the largest number of submissions with 180, with best actor in a drama close behind at 140, and best actress in a drama
